snippet: New books include “Voracious: A Hungry Reader Cooks Her Way Through Great Books” and “Slice Harvester: A Memoir in Pizza.”
abstract: Lisa Abend reviews food memoirs Cooking as Fast as I Can: A Chef's Story of Family, Food, and Forgiveness by Cat Cora with Karen Karbo, How to Cook a Moose: A Culinary Memoir by Kate Christensen, Voracious: A Hungry Reader Cooks Her Way Through Great Books by Cara Nicoletti and Slice Harvester: A Memoir in Pizza by Colin Atrophy Hagendorf.
lead_paragraph: New books include “Voracious: A Hungry Reader Cooks Her Way Through Great Books” and “Slice Harvester: A Memoir in Pizza.”
